title: Freddie Whitbread
text:
Frederick William Whitbread (31 August 1892 – 1 January 1939) was a British <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He fought under the name Freddie Whitbread He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201920%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Welterweight">men's welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1920%20Summer%20Olympics">1920 Summer Olympics</a>.
Whitbread won the 1920 <a href="England%20Boxing">Amateur Boxing Association</a> British <a href="England%20Boxing%20National%20Amateur%20Championships%20Welterweight%20Champions">welterweight title</a>, when boxing out of the Fulham ABC.
